sentences.en: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.

sentences.en: And the priest shall make atonement for him for his sin.
sentences.cn: 至于他的罪,祭司要为他赎了.

sentences.en: He sent her some flowers in atonement for his bad behavior.
sentences.cn: 他送她一些花,为自己糟糕的行为赔罪.

sentences.en: He's living in a monastery in a gesture of atonement for human rights abuses committed under his leadership.
sentences.cn: 为了弥补自己当权时对人权的践踏，他以出家来谢罪。

sentences.en: Include male goat as a sin offering to make atonement for you.
sentences.cn: 又献一只公山羊作赎罪祭,为你们赎罪.

sentences.en: ISHAN: " I have almost resolved to perform an atonement ceremony. "
sentences.cn: 伊珊: “ 我几乎下定决心要履行赎罪的仪式. ”

sentences.en: The criminal reformed and promised atonement for his acts.
sentences.cn: 那罪犯改过自新,保证赎自己的罪过.

sentences.en: They is still trying to make some sort of atonement and reparation.
sentences.cn: 他们仍在努力作出某些补偿.

sentences.en: True guilt is characterized by a readiness to make atonement for having done wrong.
sentences.cn: 真正的内疚表现为愿意弥补所犯的过错。

sentences.en: We expect the transgressor to make any atonement possible to him.
sentences.cn: 我们期待犯了过失的人有可能做到的赎罪行为.

sentences.en: We expect transgressor to make any atonement possible to him.
sentences.cn: “我深信,”西丝又重说一遍,“这是你能做的唯一的赎罪的办法. ”

sentences.en: What festivals of atonement, what sacred games shall we have to invent?
sentences.cn: 我们该发明什么赎罪的庆典, 什么神圣的把戏?

sentences.en: Who yielded His life an atonement for sin.
sentences.cn: 献上他生命为人赎罪受害.

trans.tran_cn: 弥补，赎罪，（神与人的）调和，（常大写）（耶稣的苦难和死促成的）上帝与人的和好
trans.tran_en: something you do to show that you are sorry for having done something wrong
